job.title: Technical Consultant
job.description: Working within Development to promote best practice in continuous integration & deployment
brief: Working with Keane Switzerland in Fribourg, to develop SharePoint & Windows Workflow Foundation driven interfaces to large SAP ERP systems. My remit again included implementing best practice in the form of Continuous Integration & Agile, Test Driven Development while advising & mentoring our team & clients in C#, .Net programming, architectural, development & framework implementation.
